name: Mako II, Enter The Deep
description:
Controls:

"W"/Up arrow = Move Up

"S"/Down arrow = Move Down

If you die and it doesn't go to the high score page, press the "G" key to load to the high score scene.

Red Fish = 25 points

Yellow Fish = 100 points

Pufferfish = you die

Contact with the lighter sand and the thin blue line on the top will kill you.

This is a remake/continuation of another game called Mako (Game Maker Studio 2). I made Mako II, Enter The Deep, using Unity in nine days (In between semesters.) The game's goal is to eat fish to obtain a high score and avoid pufferfish and the thin blue line at the top.
